attributes.review:
I opened the app because I LOVE ‘Mercia. The first thing I see is a photo of my wife making love to a goat. I was so concerned. Next thing I know Donald himself showed up and my door with a bunch of turtle eggs and he proceeded to sit on them, incubate them and wait for them to hatch on my lawn.  Only to kill them in front of my eyes after I had gotten emotionally attached. 
In addition Pence came by with the mother from Good Luck Charlie and told me that because I KILLED THE TURTLES it was now my time to go. Donny boy himself then morphed into satan and devoured my son, little Tommy’s soul, just like a death eater. Then they all turned to leave, but Donny was not done he had one more thing to do. He took a giant hose and poured lighter fluid all over my house and then proceeded to flick the end of his cigar he was smoking into it. This setting my house aflame.  Now I’m forced to work at a Denny’s just to survive.  

For legal reasons I’m ~kidding~

Or am I 😏
attributes.title: Trechory

attributes.review: I got this app thinking it would improve the chances of me voting for trump again in 2020 instead it ruined my life it started started glitching and I couldn’t control my republican emotions so much so that I yelled at my girlfriend and a week later I find her in the bathroom with a hanger trying to get rid of our baby I tried to hav her arrested but instead they just took her to the hospital to take care of her which is ridiculous cause the baby was more important than her right to do things with her body and her decision not to have a child with me
attributes.title: It made my gf get an abortion

attributes.review: I think the software is extremely glitched after I downloaded the app, every time I pressed on it, it wouldn’t go to the app. So I had to redownload it and this time it didn’t even download. My respect for president was always low but this low. Cmon president trump your better than that!! I’d settle for Biden any day. Also I’m very disappointed in your administration for your attempt to remove tiktok, how sad, these kids don’t deserve that and you don’t deserve to win the next election. poor Barron, he’s the same age as my grand daughter, I hope he’s doing alright #savebarrontrump
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review:
When i first opened the app the first thing i saw was a strange looking man with an orange like complexion naked and dancing to the macarena. im still scared from the images in videos i saw of this cheeto puff looking man. Every time i close my eyes at night i see him and think about all the trouble he has caused in this world. also the app is VERY slow, please don’t get this app and rate it ONE STAR... if there was an option for it i’d rate it 0 stars. ANYWAYS, Heart ❤️ been broke 💔 so many times ⏰ I don’t know 🤔 what 🤷‍♀️ to believe 🧠 mama 👩 said 🗣 it’s my 👈 fault, it’s my 👈 fault for wearing my heart ❤️ on my sleeve 👕

attributes.review: This is the worst app🤢🤢 I have ever used in my entire life. If you could please🙏🏼 take this off the Apple store that would be great. There are so many glitches and for that reason I would not recommend this app to anyone🚫🚫. I would rather download a three year old kids game then download this‼️. I have so many other reasons for not liking this app🤮🤮. I just hope the next time I come on this App Store this App will be taken down and I will never have to see it again😡. Just do everyone a favor and take this app down.‼️‼️
attributes.title: The worst app🤢😡

attributes.review: absolutely HORRIBLE app. 0/10. I would give it 0 stars if I could. SO BAD. so poor. donald and his team made an EMBARRASSMENT of an application. it will ask for your PERSONAL INFORMATION which is a VIOLATION of our 1st 2nd 5th and 8th AMENDMENT RIGHTS!! horrific. I am traumatized apple NEEDS to remove this from their download options if they truly care about the WELL BEING of their customers... I just wanted to support the president of the us of a but I was BOMBARDED with infringements on my rights and pictures of CHEETO PUFFS dressed up in suits!!! this is some sort of leftist fettish and I CANNOT BELIEVE that apple would like to be associated with it 0/100 NO STARS.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to give my upmost support to our orangutan president 👏🏻 I opened the app and found my self staring at an uncomfortable photo of an Orange Cheeto now my problem here is that I thought trumps campaign was supporting white live matter how does that work if our own president is orange!? So then my next decision was to smell the app and test it out, it smelled like STDs and I didn’t like oh yeah and my eyes hurt due to this app I do not recommend this for anyone under the age of fifty who is not white and does not live in the south so don’t waste your time downloading an app such as this.
attributes.title: It’s smelly ✨

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support my dear Cheeto puffs president💞when suddenly I was bombarded with problems he entire day🧚🏻‍♀️first my cat decided to wear a black lives matter shirt💍then my hamster decided to burn my trump2020 flag🦋and then my phone charger got a tattoo of a pride flag🌷I then opened the app to a gift card for free spray tan in the color “Garfield the cat”🌙it was a donation to trump to keep his lovely appearance on fleek🌊I entered my credit card number and then I started getting 5 dozen orders of hair pieces in the color “snow that was slightly peed on and mixed up”🍭but I know that it’s for my president😊
attributes.title: I’m so disappointed smh

attributes.review:
I have always been Trumps #1 maggot, but today I am OUTRAGED. I downloaded this app for REAL NEWS and right as i opened the app, TRUMPS PENIS!!! At first I didn’t noticed anything as it is too small to see upon first glance, but when i squinted, BAM. I am APPALLED and DISGUSTED. I am currently in the waiting room of my therapist office, hoping I can recover. SHE SAID A SIDE AFFECT MIGHT BE BECOMING A LIBERAL. I have had vivid nightmares every night of this image in my mind that has resulted in me waking screaming bloody murder. I am emotionally and mentally scarred. Please do not download this app!!! I would give it zero stars if I could. I WANT TRUMP PENCE 2020 NOT TRUMPS PENIS!!! Thank you!

BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.title: DISGUSTING
